short_description: SPECIFICATIONS: This ARES Magnetic Spark Plug Socket Set is 3/8-inch drive and includes the following sockets: 14mm and 16mm Thin Wall and 9/16-inch, 5/8-inch, and 13/16-inch. MADE TO LAST: The interior magnet in each socket won't wear out over time like traditional rubber gaskets, so this spark plug socket set can provide years of reliable use. Thanks to the convenient storage rail, you'll never have to worry about misplacing one, either, so you'll always have the size you need when you need it. These spark plug sockets meet and exceed ANSI/ASME standards.
